mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DB_HOMEPAGE.TB_KYWD_RANK_INFO ( KYWD_RANK_SEQ, RQST_ID, KYWD, WGVL_VL, PRORD, FRQ, BFR_RANK, SCR, LAST_OTPT_YMD ) VALUES ( (SELECT SEQ FROM (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(KYWD_RANK_SEQ),0)+1 AS SEQ FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.TB_KYWD_RANK_INFO) A), #{requestId}, #{term}, #{weight}, #{rank}, #{df}, #{beforeRank}, #{score}, SYSDATE() )
